wordpressPage.title: Pancake Toss Relay
wordpressPage.content:
This is a really simple game ideal for lent or pancake day.

All you need is a couple of frying pans and some of the pre-made pancakes you can buy from a supermarket.

Split the group into 2 teams and then relay style they must race…holding a frying pan containing a pancake and tossing the pancake as they go. If they drop the pancake they must pick it up.

Messy idea! – To make the game a bit more messy why not add sugar, lemon or syrup to your pancakes!
